Maria Liza has a peanut-butter-making business in the Philippines. Maria Liza requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like peanuts, oil, etc. for her food-production business.

Maria Liza has been in this business for four years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like peanuts, oil, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy construction materials and carpentry to make a necessary renovation for the house.

loans.name: Tana Lisbeth

texts.es:
La señora Tana de 28 años de edad, vive con su mama y su  hija  en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 5  años al negocio de venta de golosinas  como enchiladas, tacos, tortillas con quesillo, pastelitos,  baleadas, almuerzos, cenas,  etc.
Doña Tana vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como pollo, carnes, papas, yuca, plátanos, cebollas, platos desechables, frescos, agua en bolsa y una estufa eléctrica, con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es una cliente con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Enero del 2015.
texts.en:
Tana is 28 years old. She lives with her mother and her daughter in her own home. For the past 5 years she has had a store which sells snacks such as enchiladas, tacos, tortillas with cheese, pastelitos, baleadas, lunches, dinners, etc.

Tana lives in the community of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. She is an entrepreneurial woman who wants to get ahead and she fights days after day to improve her quality of life.

She is requested the loan to buy products such as chicken, meat, potatoes, yucca, plantains, onions, disposable plates, sodas, bagged water and an electric stove. With the help of this loan she hopes to improve her income and also her quality of life. She is a client who wants to work with Prisma.

Her dream is to have a good business and grow her clientele, while also improving her future along with that of her family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - January 2015

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, potatoes, yucca, plantains, onions, disposable plates, sodas, bagged water and an electric stove for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw material for shoemaking.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora es una mujer de 31 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su segunda actividad es atención de una tienda de barrio con alimentos de primera necesidad.
Ella es emprendedora, atenta, amable, gentil responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Kiswaras’ caracterizada porque la urbanización se inicia a partir de los cambios sociales de la Reforma Agraria y se produce una migración del campo a la ciudad poblándose de una forma desorganizada y con múltiples problemas de urbanización, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura ambiente que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Dora es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, ojos obscuros, complexión física delgada, baja estatura, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. su vida la comparte con su madre que trabaja y junto a su hermana que tiene otra actividad, viven en una casa propia contruida de ladrillo y de adobe con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la atención de una tienda de barrio con alimentos de primera necesidad como; azúcar, arros, fideo, chuño, pan, refrescos, etc., labor que realiza durante la tarde hasta la noche, durante la mañana cuenta con otra actividad que es la venta de comida, ella se ocupa de cocinar el almuerzo diario para servirlo en su restaurante ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Ambas actividades ocupan todo su tiempo. “aprendí a cocinar desde muy niña cuando le ayudaba a mi mamá, con el tiempo me anime a abrir mi tienda de barrio, ambas actividades son lucrativas y mis clientes son constantes…” comenta. Su sueño es generar mayores ingresos con ambas actividades, ella desea abastecer su tienda de barrio con alimentos de primera necesidad para contar con una mayor oferta de productos. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene desarrollando ambas actividades.
Es por esos motivos que Dora solicita un préstamo para abastecer su tienda de barrio con alimentos de primera necesidad para aumentar su oferta y generar mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Dora is a woman of 31 years of age. She is single, without children, and her second business is tending a neighborhood store that sells foods of primary necessity.

She is entrepreneurial, attentive, friendly, gracious, responsible, and hard-working. She runs her business in the Kiswaras zone, characterized by urbanization that began at the time of the social changes of the agrarian reform and produced a migration from the countryside to the city, populating it in a disorganized way and with multiple problems of urbanization. It has a cold and dry climate with an ambient temperature that varies between 0 - 12 degrees centigrade during the day.

Dora has a dark complexion, long, black hair that she braids, dark eyes, thin physique, and short stature. Her form of dress is traditional (hat, shawl, and skirt). Her native language is Aymará, which she speaks in the area, and she speaks Spanish because of general culture and for the business that she does. She shares her life with her mother, who works and along with her sister has another business. They live in their own house, which is made of bricks and adobe with a tile roof and potable water, electricity, domestic gas, and sewer service.

Her business is tending to a neighborhood store with foods of primary necessity, such as sugar, rice, pasta, freeze-dried potatoes, bread, soft drinks, etc. She does this work during the afternoon until night. During the morning she has another business, which is selling food. She is busy cooking lunch every day to serve it in her restaurant located in her same residence. Both businesses occupy all her time. "I learned to cook when I was a very young girl when I helped my mother. With time I was encouraged to open my neighborhood store. Both businesses are profitable, and my customers are steady," she comments.

Her dream is to generate greater income with both businesses. She wants to stock her neighborhood store with foods of primary necessity to have a greater offering of products. This is her first loan with the institution in the five years that she has been running both businesses. It is for these motives that Dora is requesting a loan to stock her neighborhood store with foods of primary necessity to increase her offerings and generate greater earnings.

loans.use: to stock her store with basic foods to increase her offerings and generate greater earnings.

loans.name: Macedonia

texts.es: La señora Macedonia es una persona sacrificada, madre soltera que desde que esta embarazada se encuentra sola, ahora su hija ya es mayor pero aun le sigue ayudando con sus estudios. La señora solo llego a cursar el nivel primario en la escuela. Actualmente tiene su domicilio ubicado en la población de Tiraque donde vive en una casa en alquiler, también tiene sus terrenos pero los cuales no están siendo trabajados por falta de tiempo y ayuda. Macedonia es comerciante de ropa tanto para niños, jóvenes y adultos, además de plásticos como ser bolsas de diferentes medidas en el mercado. Como se acerca la temporada escolar la señora requiere un crédito para la compra de mercadería como mochilas escolares y otros para lograr incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Macedonia is an unselfish person, a single mother who has been alone since she became pregnant. Now her daughter is older, but she still continues helping her with her studies.  She was only able to go to primary school.  

Currently she lives in the town of Tiraque in a house that she rents. She also has some land, but it is lying fallow due to a lack of time and assistance. 

Macedonia sells clothing for children, young people, and adults, in addition to plastic items, such as different sized bags, in the market. 

As the school season is approaching, she needs a loan for the purchase of merchandise such as school knapsacks and other items, so that she can increase her earnings and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as school knapsacks and other items to sell, so that she can increase her earnings and improve her living conditions.

loans.name: Lambart

texts.en:
Twenty-seven-year-old Lambart owns a farming supplies (agro-inputs) shop in Hoima, Uganda. He earns additional income from his farming wages. He hopes to expand and grow his business, despite the hardships of customers who don't pay on time. 

He has asked for credit to buy more agro-inputs to sell.

loans.use: to buy more agricultural inputs for resale.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Luzviminda works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Luzviminda is borrowing 6,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase boxes of fish to sell for her fish-vending business.

Luzviminda has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchace boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 52-year-old who lives in Salt. She is a widow woman; she was very shocked about her husband's death, but when her daughter was getting bigger, she started to be better and do her best to complete her daughter's education and achieve her husband's dream.

But her income is not enough to cover her daughter's education fees, so she applied for an education loan to help her cover her daughter's semester fees.

loans.use: to help her cover daughter's semester fees.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 25-year-old married man and a father of one child. He is living with his family in their own house, which is very small and needs a lot of expanding. 

He studied until the secondary education. Due to the miserable condition of his family, Mohammed couldn't complete his studies. 

His income is not enough to make the necessary expansion for his house. For this reason, he applied to Al-Amal Microfinance Bank and took out a loan of 200,000 YER to purchase cement and bricks to build extra rooms to expand the house.

Mohammed hopes to open a grocery to work in that will help him in improving the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase cement and bricks to build extra rooms to expand the house

loans.name: Vidal

texts.es:
Vidal tiene 74 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Cayaltí, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz, ganadería y comercio, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Con el apoyo de su esposa se dedican a la crianza y venta de animales menores en el mercado de la zona, son reconocidos por la labor que realizan. Cuenta con 20 años de experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito.

El ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de pavos, patos, cerdos, así como para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de los mismos y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá aumentar su nivel de ventas y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vidal is 74 years old, and he lives with his wife in the district of Cayaltí.  The people there devote themselves to growing sugar cane and rice, livestock-raising, and commerce.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo, within the Lambayeque Region on Peru’s northern coast. 

With his wife’s help, he raises small animals and sells them in the area market. They are well-known for the work they do; he has 20 years’ experience in this business, with good references from the people who live in his district.

He has requested a loan for the purchase of turkeys, ducks, and pigs, as well as feed for fattening them. This way, he will have a better production to offer his customers, which will allow him to increase his sales and thus improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase turkeys, ducks, and pigs, as well as feed for fattening them.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 47 years old and married, with four children, one of whom is in school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Jocelyn has operated a frozen food retail business in the Philippines for the past 7 years, and has requested a 32,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more frozen foods to sell in her food stall.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more frozen foods to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Marie Jean

texts.en:
Marie Jean is 46 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marie Jean is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marie Jean has been in this business for five years and also earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of three children, Marissa works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell beverages business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Marissa is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to purchase coconut wine to sell for her buy-and-sell beverages business.

Marissa has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase coconut wine, etc. to sell

loans.name: Astghik

texts.en:
Astghik is from Tsiatsan village, where she lives with her husband and son. She is a farmer who cultivates tomatoes, potatoes and cucumbers. Her husband and son help Astghik to gather the harvest and sell it in the market.

Astghik now needs to renovate the greenhouse and be prepared for the upcoming spring cultivation season. She asks lenders to support her purchase of tomato seeds and supplies for renovation of the greenhouse (polyethylene cover and wires).

As this is Astghik's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who did not have access to credit products before because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for tomato seeds and supplies for renovation of the greenhouse (polyethylene cover and wires).

loans.name: Franqui Alexander

texts.es:
Franqui es un hombre muy dedicado al trabajo, se desempeña como zapatero, donde no solo repara calzado si no que se encarga de pequeños pedidos de fabricación de calzado.
Inicio su negocio pro necesidad económica, por gusto al trabajo independiente, porque es lo que sabe hacer, por ser lo que lo apasiona y porque tiene un taller montado en una habitación de su hogar.
Franqui es humilde, sabe que necesita mucho para progresar y salir de sus malas condiciones, pero solo le queda trabajar honestamente y apoyarse mucho en Dios para que su situación mejore.
Busca en un futuro generar empleo, aumentar el número de clientes, comprar una vivienda propia.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos como pegamento, suelas, repuestos de tacones, clavos, cuero entre otros insumos.
texts.en:
Franqui is a man who is very dedicated to his work, he works as a shoemaker he not only repairing shoes but also doing small orders for making shoes.

He started his business out of financial necessity, because he likes to work independently, because this is what he knows how to do, because he is passionate about it and because he has a workshop located in a room of his home.

Franqui is humble, he knows he needs a lot to progress and get out of his poor conditions, but he just has to work honestly and rely on God so that his situation will improve.

He is searching to generate future employment, increase his number of customers, buy his own home.

He is requesting a loan to purchase supplies like glue, soles, spare heels, nails, leather, etc.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like glue, soles, spare heels, nails, leather, etc.

loans.name: Roba 14 Octber Group

texts.en:
Roba 14 Octber group consists of seven hardworking women from Taiz, Yemen. They have requested a group loan of 310,000 YER from AMB and will hold each other accountable for the loan repayment.

Najat is an active woman from a very poor family who doesn’t have a fixed source of income. She is a widow 51 years old and the mother of three women. After her husband passed away several years ago, Najat assumed all the responsibility for her children. Her oldest child is 21 years old and the youngest one is 15 years old. Najat's children lack a lot of necessary needs and expenses. Najat works hard to improve their living condition. She decided to purchase goats to raise and sell them. Unfortunately, she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase goats to raise and sell.

Najat looks forward to opening a saving account in a bank to improve the living conditions of her children.

loans.use: to  to purchase goats to raise and sell.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is aged 40, married to a driver and they're blessed with three children. She has sold barbeque, hot dogs and other street foods to grill in their village for almost one year and six months. With this business she earns a net income amounting to PHP 2,500 a week. Due to insufficient capital to run her business she would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase pork meat, barbeque sticks, and other food seasonings for her business. She's hoping to improve and expand her business more to earn more profits.

loans.use: To purchase pork meat, barbeque sticks, and other food seasonings for her business.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.en:
Melissa is a 38-year-old married woman with six children, four of which attend school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

For the past 4 years Melissa has operated a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines.  She requested a 7,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase sacks of charcoal to sell.

In the future, Melissa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Fabiano

texts.en:
Dairy farming is an important source of income and employment for smallholder Kenyan farmers like Fabiano.  He is 49 years old and has been happily married to Jane for the last 20 years, they have three children. 

For the past 10 years Fabiano has operated a 1-acre mixed farm in Uruku village located in the Central Province of Kenya.  He keeps dairy cattle and grows maize, vegetables, and other crops on his farm.  He also engages in other side businesses for additional income.  He is constantly upgrading and introducing new ways and approaches of doing business to make his farm more sustainable to the environment while still being profitable. 

Fabiano is seeking a loan to fully incorporate zero-grazing into his farm. The cattle management system on his farm is shifting from being extensive (which is confined in ranches and large-scale farms) to being intensive.  The intensive systems are the most predominant and comprise zero-grazing and semi-zero grazing systems.  

With your funding, the introduction of zero-grazing will create significant value for Fabiano's business.  This management system is the most suitable for this farmer, considering his land, labour, and capital.  Returns from this investment will be put back in to the business to drive its evolution into a modern practice.  Your loan will elevate the quality of life for Fabiano and his family.

loans.use: to start zero grazing.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 58 years old and has three children. She is married and has one child still in school.

Marilyn is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marilyn has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas es un joven soltero de 22 años de edad, propietario de un taller de confección donde da empleo a dos personas, aprendió de la confección gracias a su madre quien lo instruyo y desde pequeño le enseño el valor del trabajo y de valerse por sí mismo y gracias a esas enseñanzas tiene su negocio en pie y aspira a mucho más es ambicioso y tiene sed de progreso.
Tomas busca tener un local propio donde tener su taller, comprar una vivienda y seguirá trabajando no solo pro cumplir estos sueños si no pro generar más empleo y las cosas van por buen camino pues con un crédito que se encuentra solicitando para comprar una maquina fileteadora, una maquina plana y una maquina recubridora podrá emplear una persona para seguir en consolidación de su negocio y aprovechar su juventud para formar un imperio en el mundo de la confección.
texts.en:
Tomas is a single, 22-year-old young man. He is the owner of a tailoring workshop, where he employs two people. He learned this work from his mother, who instructed him. At a young age, she taught him the value of work and of fending for himself. As a result of these teachings, he established his own business, and he aspires to much more. He is ambitious, and he thirsts for progress.

Tomas desires to have a proper location for his workshop and to buy a house. He will continue working not only to fulfill his dreams, but also to generate more jobs. Things are going in the right direction, as he is requesting a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine, a lockstitch sewing machine, and a coverstitch sewing machine. This will allow him to employ one more person, to continue consolidating his business, and to take advantage of his youth by building an empire in the tailoring sector.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine, a lockstitch sewing machine, and a coverstitch sewing machine.

loans.name: Olga Nelly

texts.es:
Quizás es un lugar con la baldosa quebrada, un lugar dejado que necesita mano de obra, quizás falten implementos, pero lo que no faltan son ganas de trabajar, de progresar, de salir adelante y es aes la mentalidad que tiene Olga una vendedora de alimentos de un sector rural, madre de dos hijos, sonriente y alegre y ante todo creyente de que las cosas van a cambiar.
Con un crédito que se encuentra solicitando pone todas sus esperanzas para que su negocio prospere, invertirá en una fritadora, vitrina, pipeta de gas para iniciar a vender fritos.
texts.en:
Perhaps it is a place with broken tiles, a place left with the need of manpower, perhaps some tools are missing, but it does not lack the will to work, to progress, to get ahead and it is this mentality which Olga has, a food-seller in a rural area, mother of two children, smiling and happy and above a believer that things are going to change.

With a loan which she is requesting, she puts all her hopes into her business flourishing, she will invest in a deep fry machine, display cabinet and a gas tank to start to sell fried foods.

loans.use: to buy a deep fry machine, display cabinet and a gas tank to start to sell fried foods.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mwanajuma operates a grocery vegetables selling stall. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of the high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the KES 30,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Alegría, música, sonrisas son los tres mandamientos en la ebanistería de Manuel, un hombre con gran carisma que le gusta sonreír y disfrutar de su trabajo al sonido de buena música, Manuel es un hombre de 35 años de edad, padre de 3 hijos de 6, 9, 10 años de edad, que aprendió de su profesión capacitándose y asistiendo a cursos para tener un mejor acabado de muebles. 
Es muy trabajador, trabaja 6 días por semana 12 horas cada uno, y como es inteligente es muy consciente de lo que necesita para su negocio prospere y lo que ha detectado es que necesita optimizar más sus procesos, ofrecer a los clientes mejores tiempos de entrega y con todo esto lograr tener más pedidos.
Para poder optimizar su proceso necesita de una maquinaria y es esta la razón que lo lleva a solicitar un apoyo financiero para comprar una maquina sinfín, y materiales que serían madera, pegamento, clavos.
texts.en:
Happiness, music, smiles are the three commandments in Manuel's furniture making business, a man with a big charisma who likes to laugh and enjoy his work and the sound of good music. Manuel is a man of 35 years old, father of three children of 6, 9 and 10 years of age, who learnt his profession getting trained and going to courses to make better-finished furniture.

He is very hard-working, he works 6 days a week, 12 hours every day, and he is very intelligent and very conscious of what is needed for his business to prosper and what he has sensed is necessary to optimize his processes, offer his customers better delivery times and with all of this get more orders.

To be able to optimize his processes he needs a machine and this is the reason that he has come to request financial support - to buy a band saw and materials including wood, glue and nails.

loans.use: to buy a band saw and materials including wood, glue and nails.

loans.name: Isidro Antonio

texts.es:
Isidro es un hombre de gran responsabilidad, sus ingresos son modestos, vive en una vivienda de madera donde quizás falten muchas comodidades pero sobra el amor y la unidad familiar, es padre de 5 hijos, y su deseo de salir adelante se plasma en una petición de crédito para Iniciar su propio negocio de cría de ganado porcino, pues tiene una necesidad de mantener a todos sus 5 hijos y a su pareja.
Con el crédito comprara cerdos y construiría cocheras para albergarlos.
texts.en:
Isidro is a very responsible man who makes a modest income. He lives in a home made of wood that may lack many amenities but it has more than enough love and family unity. He is the father of 5 children and and he wants to move ahead by requesting a loan to start his own business in raising pigs. He needs to support all 5 of his children and his partner.

With this loan, he will buy pigs and build sheds to put them in.

loans.use: to buy pigs and build a shed to keep them in.

loans.name: Victor Dario

texts.es:
Él es Victor es un joven muy trabajador de 18 años de edad, nacido y criado bajo las buenas costumbres del campo, desde pequeño mostro independencia, le gustaba trabajar para tener su propio capital y hoy a sus 18 años de edad quiere tener una actividad que aprendió de sus padres la cual es la producción agropecuaria, lechero para ser más exacto y hoy se encuentra Victor pidiendo tu ayuda para completar el dinero que necesita para comprar una vaca lechera, pues el costo de está es demasiado alto.
Su principal objetivo es tener un negocio sostenible y ayudar a mejorar las condiciones de su hogar.
texts.en:
This is Victor, a hardworking young man of 18 years old, born and raised with good country manners, he showed independence since he was young, he liked working to earn his own income.

Now at 18 years old he wants to have a job that he learnt from his parents which is farming, dairy to be precise and now Victor is asking for your help to raise the money he needs to buy a dairy cow, as the cost is too high.

His main objective is to have a sustainable business and help improve the conditions at home.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 50 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Sarah is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Sarah has been raising pigs for 14 years and earns additional income from farming coconuts.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Francocer

texts.es:
Francocer es un veterano de 61 años de edad, fue padre de 5 hijos, un trabajador muy honesto que ponía gran empeño en sus actividades, por su avanzada edad no ha podido volver a emplearse, pero esto no lo detiene, a través de un crédito desea iniciar su propio negocio de cría de ganado porcino, aprovechando un pequeño terreno que tiene en su casa. 
Todos sus esfuerzos, esperanzas las pondrán en esta actividad, pues con esto planea alimentar su familia, pagar las deudas y gozar de una tranquila vejez.
Con el crédito solicitado comprara cerdos, adecuara unos establos, comprara cuido para engordarlos y se encomienda a Dios esperando tener éxito en este nuevo camino.
texts.en:
Francocer is a senior of 61 years old, father of 5 children, an honest worker who puts a great effort into his work. Due to his advanced age he hasn't been able to get a job but this doesn't deter him, through a loan he wants to start his own business breeding pigs, taking advantage of a small plot of land he has at his home.

All of his efforts and hopes will be put into this business, and with this he plans to feed his family, pay his debt and enjoy a peaceful old age.

With the loan he is requesting he will buy pigs, get some stalls, buy feed to fatten them and trust in God, hoping to have success on this new path.

loans.use: to start a business breeding pigs, he will buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Teresita works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming abaca. Teresita is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 63 years old and married with seven children. Gloria works very hard to provide for them.

Gloria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Gloria has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, spices, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Gloria would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for her husband's welding work

loans.name: Robiya

texts.en: Robiya is a conscientious woman. She was born in 1957. She is living in the southern part of a country. She is married. She has one child. She is a seller. She is busy buying and selling grocery products. She is selling in her house. She started her business selling vegetables, greens and different vegetable salads in the domestic market. She is planning to enlarge her assortment of products and buy a refrigerator for keeping them fresh. Robiya needs financial support to buy vegetables and a refrigerator for her store.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and a refrigerator

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 24 years old and married with one child that attends school.  For 2 years now she has operated an agriculture business raising pigs in the Philippines.  

Michelle requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.  She has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Michelle would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Annabella

texts.en:
Annabella is a 36-year-old married woman with three children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Annabella has a buy-and-sell condiments business in the Philippines. She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like garlic, onions, etc.

Annabella has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like garlic, onions, etc.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Ella es Gladys una tendera con más de 20 años de tradición en el mercado, es casada y con tres hijos ya mayores de edad, vende todo tipo de abarrotes, su trayectoria reflejan la seriedad y la buena administración que tiene de su negocio, su puntualidad de pago en préstamos y su ingenio para superar adversidades.
Gladys en estos tiempos se tiene que enfrentar con un problemática que afecta su modo de trabajo, el cual es los mini mercados, estos establecimientos están arrasando con la clientela y obligando a los tenderos a cerrar por falta de clientes, pero no se quiere rendir y aspira a evolucionar su negocio en un mini-mercado y así competir a la par.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de abarrotes, productos de refrigeración, dulces, galletería y bebidas, quiere mejorar sus ventas e ir ampliando su espacio y comenzar la transformación de su tienda de abarrotes en un mini-mercado.
texts.en:
This is Gladys, a shop owner with more than 20 years of history in the business, married with three adult children. She sells all types of groceries, her career reflects the seriousness and good administration with which she conducts business, the punctuality of repaying her loans and her ingenuity in overcoming adversity.

Nowadays Gladys has to confront a problem which is affecting the way she works, which is the mini-markets. These establishments are taking customers and forcing shopkeepers to close due to a lack of customers, but she doesn't want to give up and aims to convert her business into a mini-market to compete with them.

She is requesting a loan to buy grocery supplies, chilled goods, sweets, cookies and drinks, she wants to improve her sales and expand her space and start transforming her grocery store into a mini-market.

loans.use: to buy supplies for a grocery store, chilled goods, sweets, cookies and drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials for her husband to make shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover repair costs for her husband's rickshaw

loans.name: Nuru

texts.en:
Nuru is a married woman and has been blessed with five children, all of whom attend school. Together with her husband, they live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a fish selling business for over five years, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces a major challenge of transportation in her business.

With the Kshs 20,000, she wants to purchase bundles of fish for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale

loans.name: Norilyn

texts.en:
Norilyn works hard to support her family. She is a married woman with two children and she has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Norilyn requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, oil, flour, etc. for her food production business.

Norilyn has been in this business for 3 years now, and also earns additional income from personal collection. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, spices, oil, flour, etc for her food production business.

loans.name: Cesar Gregorio

texts.es:
Cesar es un joven del sector de Sincelejo, una zona muy pobre afectada por el conflicto armado, personas con baja educación pero muy honestas una de ellas es cesar un joven padre de dos gemelas de 7 meses de edad, que busca con la ayuda de un crédito tener una actividad económica para generar los recursos para sacar a su familia adelante. 
El crédito que busca lo invertirá en la compra de un estadero de aves, comprar gallinas y pollos de engorde para vender huevos y paralelamente pollos.
Esta actividad nace del coraje, de la necesidad de querer cambiar el futuro de que sus hijas no pasen por su situación y que tenga las herramientas para salir de esta zona y vivir dignamente.
texts.en:
Cesar is a young man from the Sincelejo district, a very poor area affected by the armed conflict, people with little education but very honest and one of them is Cesar, a young father of 7-month-old twins, who is seeking the help of a loan to have a paid job to generate income to bring up his family.

The loan he is seeking will be invested in buying a chicken coup, to buy hens and chickens to fatten to sell eggs and also chickens. 

This business was born out of courage, from the need to change his future so that his daughters don't find themselves in the same situation and have the tools to get out of this area and live with dignity.

loans.use: to start his business raising poultry, he will build a coup, buy chickens, hens and feed.

loans.name: Dioscoro

texts.en:
Dioscoro is 59 years old and married with four children.

Dioscoro works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like eggs, canned goods, groceries, etc. to resell.

Dioscoro has borrowed and paid back 1 loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Dioscoro aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like eggs, canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Robilyn

texts.en:
Robilyn is 36 years old and has two children. Robilyn is married and one of her children is still in school.

Robilyn is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Robilyn requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional pigs, feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Robilyn has been in this business for seven years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money to be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs, feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Elizabeth is 51 years old and has four children who are in school.

Elizabeth has a business buying and selling firewood in the Philippines. Elizabeth requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional firewood to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for five years. In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money to be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fire wood to sell

loans.name: Astghik

texts.en:
Astghik lives with her big family in the village of Zovaber of Gegharkunik region. Astighik lives with her husband, two children (both of them are already students) and her retired father-in-law. She has no higher education and since getting married, she has engaged in farming with her lovely husband. 

On her farm Astghik has 2 cows, 2 calves, 2 pigs, 7 sheep, 3 lambs and 20 chickens. She makes perfect cheese and butter which she sells to her villagers. Astghik's husband sells their farm’s meat and eggs at the city's wholesale market during the week. In his free time from work, he works as a driver. In agricultural activities, Astghik’s father-in-law helps her and together they cultivate potatoes and greens. 

The members of the family try to help each other sustain their family's needs and to provide the children with good living conditions. Astghik wants to make her farm richer with farm cattle, but she still has one more important item to solve. After winter, her farm cattle have a lack of fodder, so she is asking for this loan in order to buy two calves and a lot of animal fodder for her cattle to last them until the coming spring.

loans.use: to buy two calves and also a lot of animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more Irish potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Gemmaline

texts.en:
Gemmaline is a 37-year-old married woman and the mother of two children from Merida, Leyte. She is engaged in the hog raising business, and that is the source of her income. 

Gemmaline is asking to take a loan in order to buy additional piglets to raise. She would also like to purchase animal feed. This loan will help her improve her hog raising business as well as her income and profit. In the future, Gemmaline dreams of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Eresvita

texts.es:
Eresvita tiene 37 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de sus animales así como para realizar reparaciones del lugar donde los cría (corrales). Eresvita espera mejorar la calidad de sus animales lo que le generará mayores ventas y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Eresvita is 37 years old and in a common-law relationship. She lives with her family in a rural area in the District of Oyotún. This community is located in Chiclayo Province, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. Life in this district is peaceful. The residents engage in agriculture and raising animals.

Eresvita raises and sells guinea pigs. Her business is located at her home. She has more than three years of experience in this business and her established customers have provided very good personal and work-related references on her behalf. Eresvita is requesting a loan in order to buy balanced feed for fattening her animals. She will also make repairs to the pens where the animals are kept.

Eresvita hopes to improve the quality of her animals so that she can generate higher sales, which will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for fattening her animals and to make repairs to her animal pens.

loans.name: Nyabange Grp Msm Group

texts.en:
Maimuna, who is in her early 30's, is a widow with two children who are still in school.  She has been running two projects, a beauty salon and selling clothing for seven years now.  She works from 7am to 8pm daily and is able to earn a good monthly profit.

This will be Maimuna's 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase clothing stock and restock the missing items in her salon.  She has paid back her previous loans successfully and used the profit to pay school fees, saved money in her bank account, pay loan dues and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to increase the salon products and buy additional up to date clothing to meet the needs of her customer.  She dreams of starting another business.

Maimuna will share this loan with her loan group "Nyabange Grp Msm" which has one other member who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy salon products as well as additional up to date clothing to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
Binti is a married woman and has been blessed with four kids, one of whom currently attends school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

Binti operates a fish selling business which has been operational for over 20 years. She mentioned seasonality and transportation as the main challenges in her business. Binti dreams of becoming a wholesaler of fish in the future. 

With the 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase sacks of fish for resale. She joined Yehu to access loans that would help her to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fish for resale.

loans.name: Maylene

texts.en:
Maylene is 31 years old and single. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Maylene runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, spices, canned goods, milk, sugar, etc.  Maylene has been in this business for 2 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, spices, canned goods, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Emelinda

texts.en:
Emelinda is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Emelinda is 47 years old, and one child is in school.

Emelinda has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. Emelinda requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy abaca fiber and other materials needed for her weaving business.

Emelinda has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, Emelinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy abaca fiber and other materials used for weaving

loans.name: Elva

texts.en:
Elva is 47 years old and married with five children. With two children in school, Elva works very hard to provide for them.

Elva runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Elva has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Elva would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Emelinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Emelinda works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling of beauty products business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Emelinda is borrowing 5,000 PHP through NWTF to buy items like body lotion, shampoo, etc., to sell for her beauty products business.

Emelinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like body lotion, shampoo, etc., to sell

loans.name: Mwacheni

texts.en:
Mwacheni is a married mother of two children, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over two years, she has operated an open-air food-selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Meri

texts.en:
Meri lives with her parents-in-law, husband and three kids in Dasht village of the Armavir region. 

Meri's husband works at a local bakery as a distributor and other family members are involved in farming. They keep livestock of cows, a pig and seven piglets, and cultivate potatoes and greens. 

Meri and her family work hard to sustain their farm, as it is a very important source of income for them. To be able to pay for renovation of the barn and purchase potato seeds for cultivation, Meri has applied for this loan. As this is Meri's first loan,  it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who did not have access to credit products before because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the barn and purchase potato seeds for cultivation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more supplies for her own general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: and her husband to purchase smooth wooden boards and bamboo.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a moto rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Mwanamkuu

texts.en:
Mwanamkuu is married with two children, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a cashew nuts business for the past ten years, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.  Her dream is to establish a rental house in the near future. 

With the 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase seven sacks of cashew nuts. She decided to join Yehu in order to access loans and boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase seven sacks of cashew nuts.

loans.name: Mwanahamisi

texts.en:
Mwanahamisi is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mwanahamisi operates a grocery vegetables stall; she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

With the 30,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes and onions for resale

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Ester works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Ester is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy dried fish to sell for her business.

Ester has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy dried fish to sell

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Luzviminda is 59 years old now.

Luzviminda has a salon business in the Philippines. Luzviminda requested a 7,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy a blower, rebonding, hair coloring, etc., for her salon.

Luzviminda has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Luzviminda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a blower, rebonding, hair coloring, etc., for her salon

loans.name: Philomène

texts.fr: Philomène est femme veuve qui est âgée de 61 ans et vit à Mayakopé avec ses sept enfants dans la ville de Lomé au Togo. Philomène a entrepris une petite boutique où elle vend des produits d’alimentations générales. Ce commerce lui procure une rentabilité nécessaire pour assurer la survie quotidienne de ses enfants et leur éducation. Philomène achète ses marchandises au grand marché de Lomé. Pour lancer un nouvel achat afin d’équiper sa boutique, Philomène demande ce prêt pour la réalisation de son objectif.
texts.en: Philomène is a 61-year old widow who lives with her seven children in the Mayakopé neighborhood in the town of Lomé in Togo. She runs a small grocery store. This business provides her with an income necessary to support her children and pay for their education. Philomène buys her merchandise at the main market of Lomé. In order to restock her merchandise and meet her goals, Philomène is requesting a loan.

loans.use: to buy five boxes of soap, two boxes of milk and three boxes of pasta.

loans.name: Bibi Saeeda

texts.en:
Bibi Saeeda is a 42-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two daughters. Her husband has been running a fabrics shop for past 20 years; he is the only one responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family and managing the household.

Bibi Saeeda's husband wants to purchase different types of fabrics and sheets to fulfill the demands of his customers, but due to financial constraints he is not in the position to buy this merchandises for reselling purposes. To fulfill his business needs, Bibi Saeeda has applied for a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all these things to fulfill his business needs. This will also be helpful for him to increase his daily sales and earn more profitable income to manage the business and family's needs.

Bibi Saeeda is very happy and thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's fabrics business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room that he can rent out for extra income.

loans.name: Mohinav

texts.ru: Мохинав проживает на районе Восеъ. Ей 44 года. Мохинав спокойная, коммуникабельная и ответственная женщина. Она замужем. Мохинав хочет начать новый бизнес. Она планирует купить новую швейную машинку и предоставлять услугу портнихи. Мохинав прекрасно умеет шить и не использовала свои способности в выгодный бизнес. Финансовое состояние семьи не положительное и Мохинав решила найти источник дохода и выбрала самый лучший вариант для бизнеса. Мохинав хочет на заемные деньги купить профессиональную швейную машинку и предоставлять услугу портнихи на дому. Она надеется, что при покупке машинке Вы сможете ей помочь. Она заранее благодарить Вас за помощь.
texts.en: Mohinav lives in the Vose region of Tajikistan.  She is 44 years old, married, and is a peaceful, sociable and responsible woman.  Mohinav wants to start a new business, and is planning on buying a new sewing machine and offering her services as a seamstress.  She is very good at making clothes, and hasn't used her skills in a profitable business before.  Her family's financial situation isn't good, and Mohinav has decided to find a source of income, choosing the best possible kind of business for herself.  She wants to take out a loan to buy a professional sewing machine and work out of home as a seamstress.  She hopes that you'll be able to help her do so, and thanks you in advance for your help.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine to start a new business for making clothing to order

loans.name: Reyna Emely

texts.es: Reyna de 36 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, ella necesita invertir en insumos agrícolas por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL nuevamente un crédito que le permita comprar mas semilla, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía, etc. y asi poder seguir teniendo mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Reyna is 36 years old and lives with her husband and three children. She is a farmer who specifically grows corn and beans. Reyna has worked in this trade for 15 years and has gained valuable experience. As a result, she has been able to achieve better harvests. Her farmland is located in an agricultural area. She sells her crops in all of the surrounding areas and already has many established customers. These people choose her products because of the quality and the affordable prices.

Reyna needs to invest in farming supplies, so she is requesting another loan from Apoyo Integral. She will be able to buy more seeds, compost, insecticides, fertilizers, and pest controls so that she can improve the land that is shown in the photograph. As a result, she can continue to achieve better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more seeds, compost, insecticides, fertilizers, and pest controls so that she can improve her land.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es:
Israel, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, fue víctima de la guerra armada que afecto al país en los años 80 y 92, vivió en las montañas y estudio después de la guerra, producto de la guerra, perdió una mano, está acompañado y tiene dos hijas, su pareja se dedica a elaborar semillas con dulces y a vender ropa para niños, de esa manera le ayuda a su pareja.

Israel, trabaja en estructuras metálicas, hace puertas, ventanas y techos de hierro, fue capacitado por varias instituciones y es un buen trabajador; tiene 10 años de trabajar en ese rubro.- Antes, trabajaba en la agricultura pero debido a que le falta una mano, se le dificultaba realizar ese trabajo.

Israel, necesita el dinero para comprar equipo eléctrico para su trabajo, ya que el equipo anterior se le quemo, por lo tanto necesita un nuevo compresor, planta y pulidora. 

El sueño de Israel es, trabajar para que sus hijas puedan lograr graduarse de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Israel is 43 years old and studied through the third grade. He was a victim of the civil war that affected his country between 1980 and 1992. Israel lived in the mountains and studied after the war. As a result of the war, he lost an arm. Israel is in a relationship and has two daughters. His partner produces candied nuts and also sells children’s clothing as way of helping financially.

Israel does metal work. He produces doors, windows, and metal roof beams. Israel received training at various institutions and is a good worker. He has been working in this trade for 10 years. Previously, he worked in agriculture but had difficulty because he is lacking one hand.

Israel needs the money in order to buy electrical equipment for his work. His previous equipment is no longer functional, so he needs a new compressor, generator, and polisher.

Israel dreams of working so that his daughters can graduate with a university degree.

loans.use: to buy electrical equipment for his work.

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Amélé, âgée de 38 ans est une femme mariée et vit à Adamavo avec son mari et ses quatre enfants. Amélé vend des détergents en se promenant dans les marchés et dans les quartiers environnant pour fournir ses clients. Pour un stock toujours disponible, Amélé s’approvisionne deux fois par semaine au grand marché de Lomé. Amélé a le désir d’acheter des détergents  pour alimenter son étagère et nécessite ce fonds pour réaliser son achat afin d’avoir une rentabilité lui permettant de soutenir les charges de sa famille.
texts.en:
Amélé is 38 years old, married, and lives in Adamavo with her husband and her four children. 

Amélé sells detergent and supplies her clients by walking through markets and nearby neighborhoods. Amélé buys supplies two times a week in the Grand Market of Lomé so that she always has enough stock. 

Amélé buys detergent to fill her shelves. She needs this loan to buy her goods and to be profitable enough take care of the family expenses.

loans.use: buy 5 bags of detergent.

loans.name: Laure

texts.fr: Laure est une femme mariée âgée 31 ans et vit à Adamavo. Laure est une mère de trois enfants qui bénéficient tous d’une scolarité adéquate. Pour être toujours capable de répondre aux besoins quotidiens, Laure vend des bijoux en parcourant les quartiers pour satisfaire les clients. Laure s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand marché de lomé. Pour commander d’autres marques de bijoux, Laure demande ce crédit pour financer son achat.
texts.en:
Laure is married, 31 years old, and lives in Adamavo. Laure is the mother of three children who all have adequate schooling. 

So that she can always respond to her family's daily needs and satisfy her clients, Laure sells jewelry by wandering around the neighborhoods. Laure buys her supplies two times a month in the Grand Market of Lomé. 

Laure is asking for a loan so that she can order and buy other brands of jewelry.

loans.use: buy 5 boxes of women's jewelry.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Magoe, Província de Tete tem 58 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai 6 filhos apenas 1 é menor de idade, 2 é que frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém. 
Trabalha no Estado  mais de 15 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como chapas, pedrinhas, barrotes e pranchas. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior. O seu maior desafio é terminar a sua obra de residência.
texts.en:
Antonio was born in Magoe, in Tete province, and is 58 years old. He is a married father to 6 children, of which only one is under the age of 18 and 2 are still in education.He is not financially responsible for anyone else.
He has been working for the State government for more than 15 years and he uses his income from this role to cover his household expenses. He plans to use this loan to continue with building work on his home and he will use it to buy corrugated sheeting, pebbles, beams and boards. This will be his third loan with Hluvuku and, in the future, he hopes to finish the work on his house and ensure that his children complete their college education. The greatest challenge that he faces is finishing the building work on his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as  corrugated sheeting, pebbles, beams and boards.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Inhambane tem 31 anos de idade vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade apenas 1 frequenta a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha como segurança a mais de 8 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento e outros. Este é o seu 5º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar a sua obra de residência e mais tarde contrair o matrimónio. O seu maior desafio é garantir o bem estar da sua família.
texts.en: Jose was born in Inhambane and is 31 years old. He lives with his partner with whom he has 2 young children, only 1 of whom currently attends school. He is not financially responsible for anyone else. He has been working as a security guard for more than 8 years and he uses his income from this role to cover his household expenses. He plans to use this loan to continue with building work on his home and he will use it to buy materials such as sand, cement and other items. This will be his fifth loan with Hluvuku and, in the future, he hopes to undertake further building work on his home and, later, to marry his partner. The greatest challenge that he faces is ensuring his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as sand, cement and other items.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Maputo tem 40 anos idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos dos quais 2 maiores de idade todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelo seu pai que vive na cidade de Maputo.
Trabalha como motorista a mais de 8 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento, pedras e outros que forem necessário. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku. 
Futuramente pretende ampliar a sua obra de residência e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en: Joao was born in Maputo province and is 40 years old. He is a married father to 3 children, 2 of whom are over the age of 18 and all of whom are still in education. Joao is also financially responsible for his father who lives in the city of Maputo. He has worked as a driver for more than 8 years and he uses his income from this role to cover his household expenses. He plans to use this loan to continue with building work on his home and he will use it to buy materials such as sand, cement and stone, among other items needed. This will be his second loan with Hluvuku and, in the future, he hopes to carry out further building work on his home and to ensure that his children complete their college education.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as sand and cement, among other items.

loans.name: Oguldjennet

texts.ru: Огулдженнет 34 летняя женщина района Чиликул. Она проживает вместе семьей. Огулдженнет замужем и мать троих детей. Дети учатся в школе. Муж работает строителем. Огулдженнет сама занимается земледелием. Она добрая и ответственная женщина. Огулдженнет 18 лет своей жизни занята этим видом деятельностью. Ей нравится своя работа. Огулдженнет сейчас планирует купить минеральные удобрения. Ей надо соединить минеральные удобрения с почвой, чтобы получить богатый урожай. У Огулдженнет берет кредит, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. Огулдженнет верит и надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Oguldjennet is a 34-year-old resident of the Jilikul district. She lives there with her family. Oguldjennet is married and a mother of three children. The children attend a school. Her husband is a construction worker. Oguldjennet is involved in farming. She is a kind and responsible woman. Oguldjennet has been involved in this business for 18 years. She likes her work. Now Oguldjennet is planning to buy mineral fertilizers. She needs to mix the mineral fertilizers with the soil to get a plentiful harvest. Oguldjennet is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers. She believes and hopes for Your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Badahshon

texts.ru: Эта Бадахшон. Она молодая жительница района Пяндж. Она еще не замужем и не имеет детей. Ей 26 лет. Она живет с мамой и сестрой.  Бадахшон шустрая и самостоятельная девушка. Она работает секретаршей. После работы Бадахшон занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она хорошо справляет с обоими делами. В швейном деле она уже более 3 лет.  Бадахшон помогает маме обеспечить семью.  Бадахшон обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить швейную машинку улучшить процесс своей работы. Это кредит поможет ей не потерять источник дохода.
texts.en: This is Badahshon. She is a young woman from the Pyandj district. She is still not married and does not have children. She is 26 years old. She lives with her mother and sister. Badahshon is a smart and independent young woman. She works as a secretary. After work, Badahshon is involved in sewing women's clothing. She handles both jobs well. She has been in the sewing business for over 3 years. Badahshon helps her mother to provide for the family. Badahshon requested this loan to buy a sewing machine in order to improve her work process. This loan will help her retain her income source.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Эта женщина Мехринисо. Ей 33 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей.   Мехринисо сейчас занимается продажей семечки и молочных продуктов. Она еще занимается земледелием. Мехринисо сажает овощи, картофель, лук, морковь и другие овощи. Она каждый сезон готовить почву к посеву вмешивая минеральные удобрения с почвой. От почвы с минеральными удобрениями можно получить богатых урожай. Мехринисо хорошо справляется земледелием. У нее 15 летный  опыт работы . Мехринисо хочет купить минеральные удобрения, но из-за нехватки денег она обратилась за кредитом. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет Мехринисо не лишиться источника дохода на следующий сезон.
texts.en: This woman is Mehriniso. She is 33 years old, married and has three children. Currently Mehriniso is involved in selling seeds and dairy products. She is also involved in farming. Mehriniso plants vegetables, potatoes, onions, carrots and other vegetables. She prepares the soil for sowing by mixing mineral fertilizers with the soil every season. Soil with mineral fertilizers can produce a rich harvest. Mehriniso handles farming well. She has 15 years of experience in this business. Mehriniso wants to buy mineral fertilizers, but requested a loan due to a shortage in money. The requested loan will help Mehriniso retain her income source for the next season.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Nimia Carlota

texts.es:
Nimia tiene 62 años de edad, es soltera, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Las actividades económicas principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Nimia espera poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Nimia is 62 years old, single and lives with her family in the Oyotún district, in a rural area in the Chiclayo province. Located in the Lambayeque region on Peru’s northern coast, the people in Oyotún mainly make a living in farming, trade and cattle-raising.

Nimia herself makes a living selling groceries such as rice, sugar, oil and pasta. She has three years’ experience with the business and has good personal and professional references locally. 

Nimia is applying for this loan in order to buy merchandise, such as rice, sugar and oil to increase stock at her business. Nimia hopes that this loan will allow her to attend to her local customers’ diverse needs and tastes. She then hopes that this will be reflected in her income and thus improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as rice, sugar and oil to increase stock at her business.

loans.name: Mireya Jaqueline

texts.es:
La señora Mireya de 40  años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijos  en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 5  años al negocio de venta de baleadas enchiladas, tacos, pastelitos, refrescos naturales, etc. 
Doña Mireya vive en una aldea de San Lorenzo  al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como harina, mantequilla, frijoles, frescos, manteca, leña,  etc.  Con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Enero del 2015.
texts.en:
Mireya is 40 years old and lives with her husband and children in a house owned by the family. For five years Mireya has earned a living selling enchiladas, tacos, pastries, natural drinks and more.

Mireya lives in a village in San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. She is enterprising and wants to get ahead. She works hard every day in order to improve her quality of life.

Mireya is applying for this loan in order to buy flour, butter, beans, butter, firewood, soft drinks, and more for her business. With the support of this loan, Mireya plans to increase her income and improve her quality of life. Mireya is a new borrower and wants to work with Prisma Honduras.

Mireya dreams of having a successful business and of increasing her number of customers. At the same time, she wants to enjoy a better future with her family.
 
San Lorenzo, Honduras; January 2015

loans.use: to buy flour, butter, beans, butter, firewood, soft drinks, and more for her business.

loans.name: Jeiner

texts.es:
Jeiner tiene 29 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el distrito de La Florida una comunidad de clima variado, ubicada en la Provincia de San Miguel que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales principalmente.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como gallos, gallinas, pollos, desde hace 5 años en la parte posterior a su domicilio, cuenta con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para la compra de variedad de animales para ofrecer a sus clientes. Con esto el espera ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus gustos y preferencias lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jeiner is 29 years old and lives with his wife and son in the La Florida district, which has a varying climate. Located in the San Miguel province of the Cajamarca region, La Florida is in Peru’s northern highlands. The locals here mainly make a living in farming and raising animals.

Jeiner himself has worked raising and selling animals such as cocks and hens for five years. Running the business from the back of his home, he has regular customers who provide very good personal and professional references. 

Jeiner is applying for a loan in order to buy feed to fatten up his animals and to buy more animals to sell to his customers. Jeiner hopes that this loan will allow him to offer a greater variety of products to customers, satisfying their tastes and needs, and increasing his income. This would allow Jeiner to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed to fatten up his animals and to buy more animals to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Mékplowodo

texts.fr: Mékplowodo vit à Adamavo étant une femme veuve qui s’occupe de la charge de ses enfants. Pour ne pas vivre uniquement sans entreprendre une activité,  Mékplowodo vend des piments verts et secs au marché. Mékplowodo achète ses produits au grand marché de Lomé deux fois par semaine afin d’avoir en permanence un stock disponible. Mékplowodo veut acheter plus de sacs de piments et demande ce microcrédit pour continuer son activité et réaliser des bénéfices qu’elle pourra utiliser pour soutenir l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mékplowodo lives in Adamovo. She is a widow and is busy taking care of her children. So she has work to do, she sells dried [and fresh] green peppers at a market. 

Mékplowodo buys her products at the Grand Market of Lomé two times a week in order to maintain an available stock. She wants to buy more sacs of peppers and is seeking this micro-loan to continue her business and make earnings that will be used to support her children's education.

loans.use: to buy two sacs of green peppers

loans.name: Nelly Damaris

texts.es:
La vida ha colocado a Nelly en muchas situaciones de superación, lo que le ha permitido madurar en todos los ámbitos de su vida. Con 28 años de edad, ella ha trabajado como empacadora y estudiado todos los domingos para sacar su licenciatura en Administración de Empresas. Ahora estudia el cuarto año de la carrera que le motivó estudiar debido a las grandes oportunidades de trabajo en esta área laboral. 
Nelly siente que está a punto de terminar con esta importante etapa de su vida, por lo que no duda ni un segundo en invertir en sus estudios. Por esta razón es que solicita un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación, con el cual podrá graduarse y obtener oficialmente su licenciatura. Con esta oportunidad podrá ampliar su posibilidades profesionalizarse como ella lo sueña. En sus metas está obtener un nuevo empleo donde pueda adquirir experiencia en su carrera universitaria y llegar a formar una familia.
texts.en:
Life has given Nelly many opportunities to become a better person and this has allowed her to mature in all aspects of her life. At 28 years old, Nelly works as a packer while studying every Sunday to obtain her degree in business management. Now, she is studying her fourth year and is motivated by the great working opportunities that will be available for her with this degree.

Nelly will soon finish this important stage of her life and she does not doubt for a second the value of her education. She is therefore applying for a loan in order to pay for her final graduation course. This will allow her to officially obtain her degree.

This loan opportunity will allow Nelly to increase the opportunities available to her to become a professional, which is what she dreams of. One of Nelly’s goals is to find a new job where she can gain experience in her area of studies. In the future, she would like to have a family.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Kafui

texts.fr: Agée des 38 ans, Kafui est une femme mariée et vit à Adamavo avec ses quatre enfants. Kafui entreprend une activité de vente de légumes et des fruits dans son quartier et fait de bons profits grâce à son commerce. Kafui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois dans les marchés où elle trouve ses légumes à des prix profitables pour ne pas avoir de pertes. Kafui a le souci d’acheter de commander d’autres marchandises et désire ce prêt pour financer ses achats
texts.en:
At 38 years old, Kafui is a married woman and lives in Adamavo with her four children. Kafui works selling fruits and vegetables in her area and earns a profit thanks to this commerce.

Kafui procures her goods twice a month in the markets, where she finds vegetables that she can resell at a profit without having any losses.
